generate_gb_information module¶

generate_gb_information.find_ATGB_data(sigma, mis, path, axis, period_cutoff=50)[source]¶

Function to generate the atgb_data to be obtained from SNF input file Input : (sigma number, misorientation, inout file path, maximum CSL period required) Output:

Parameters:

  • sigma (int) – Sigma value of GB.

  • mis (float) – Misorientation of GB.

  • path (string) – Path to oilab output.

  • axis (1D array) – Tilt axis of GB.

  • period_cutoff (int,Optional) – Parameter that controls which GBs are output based on the period of GB.The default is 50

Returns:

a – Array with rows: 0:sigma_num, 1:misorientation, 2:inclination, 3:period, 4:burgers_vector_x, 5:burgers_vector_y, 6:burgers_vector_z, 7:step height, H, 8:step_vector_x, 9:step_vector_y, 10:step_vector_z

Return type:

2D array

generate_gb_information.gb_props(sigma, mis, axis, lat_par, choose_decision=1)[source]¶

Reads input parameters and generates the requisit gb properties (burgers vector, step height, period)

Parameters:

  • sigma (int) – Sigma value of GB.

  • mis (float) – Misorientation of GB.

  • axis (1D array) – Tilt axis

  • lat_par (float) – lattice parameter

  • choose_decision (int, optional) – Factor that helps decide if you want to choose the disconnection mode or want to run the default one. 1 means you choose the disconnection mode, 0 runs the default mode. The default is 1.

Returns:

  • gb_data (1D array) – Information read from oILAB output about the GB (sigma, misorientation, inclination, period)

  • bur (float) – Burgers vector of disconnection mode chosen.

  • step_height (float) – Step height of disconnection mode chosen.

generate_gb_information.read_data(path_r, sigma_val=13)[source]¶

Function to read the data file containing the misorientation, inlclination burgers vectors and step heights

Parameters:

  • path_r (string) – path of .txt file containing oILAB output

  • sigma_val (int,Optional) – Sigma value of GB

Returns:

data –

Array data with row format{sigma,mis,inc,period,tn_x,tn_y,tn_z,bn_x,bn_y,bn_z,

bx,by,bz,h,bx1,by1,bz1,h1,bx2,by2,bz2,h2,H}

Return type:

2D array
